justification: The vendor explicitly states support for federated learning, enabling collaborative model training on decentralized data 'while maintaining data privacy and security' (Cloud 1 Machine Learning) and 'enabling collaborative analytics across different organizational boundaries' (Vendor 1 Fabric). Integration with security standards (GDPR, ISO, SOC 2) directly addresses privacy and compliance. Interfaces support open frameworks and integration. However, the description does not specifically mention 'digital twin edge devices,' so a perfect score is not warranted.
ability: The ability to train an algorithm across multiple decentralized digital twin edge devices or servers holding local data samples, without exchanging their data samples.
